page.title: 13SHOPS
page.content: { Redhill school} asked local people whether they are satified with the local shops. { Mottingham} "They are too expensive because there is no competition" "The shops are alright for basic items but you need to go to Eltham or Bromley for luxuries {Chislehurst}"Yes I can do all my shopping in the village. Sainsbury's supermarket is good and I am satisfied. In fact some local shops such as Mottingham village now have no butchers and only one grocer's store.Perhaps the change in types of shops is a reflection of changing interests. {Wyborne School} looked at shops in {New Eltham}.An antique shop has closed replaced by a Chinese restaurant.Two video shops have opened and a computer shop has expanded.The oldld sweet shop is now a video hire
